item.title: Welcome
item.description: ‘Hello World!’ Now that I’ve gotten that taken care of, onward to other things. I’m a Systems Admin working at OmnicomMediaGroup. Lately I’ve been working on a PowerShell module for API calls into our in house developed onboarding platform. In my spare time, I’ve been working on a few Raspberry Pi projects to automate video uploads and transcoding into AWS buckets. As I run across things that interest me, I’ll post about them.
